syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Physics 9702

learning_objectives.description: recall the following SI base quantities and their units: mass (kg), length (m), time (s), current (A), temperature (K)
express derived units as products or quotients of the SI base units and use the derived units for quantities listed in this syllabus as appropriate
use SI base units to check the homogeneity of physical equations

recall and use the following prefixes and their symbols to indicate decimal submultiples or multiples of both base and derived units: pico (p), nano (n), micro (Î¼), milli (m), centi (c), deci (d), kilo (k), mega (M), giga (G), tera (T)
